Title: Relates to the suspension of laws during a declared state of emergency; and permitting schools to open under certain circumstances
Summary: Permits the legislature to override certain powers of the executive during a declared state of emergency; permits schools to open where a social distance of three feet can be maintained.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to the suspension of laws during a declared state of emergency; and permitting schools to open to students under certain guidelines
